gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `EmployeeBenefitsExpenses`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST101Variable1_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST101Variable1_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST101Variable1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST101Variable1_EmployeeBenefitsExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdown_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsExpensesBreakdownCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
